description: Index of Coincidence tests for text randomness analysis

tests.name: ioc_english_text
tests.comment: IOC of English text should be around 0.066

input.value: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. This is a sample English text for testing the Index of Coincidence calculation.

tests.skipReason: Index of Coincidence HTML output format needs verification - should show IC ~0.066

tests.name: ioc_repeated_chars
tests.skipReason: Index of Coincidence HTML output format needs verification - should show IC ~1

tests.name: ioc_random_chars
tests.skipReason: Index of Coincidence HTML output format needs verification - should show low IC

tests.name: ioc_mixed_text
tests.comment: IOC of mixed case English text

input.value: Hello World! This is a TEST message with MIXED case letters.

tests.skipReason: Index of Coincidence HTML output format needs verification

tests.name: ioc_short_text
tests.skipReason: Index of Coincidence HTML output format needs verification
